website_summaries.verdict: Sleek and attractive ladies Seiko watch powered by Light Energy and featuring a 10-month power reserve.
pros: Bracelet-like 15mm case, iridescent yellow gold color
Design recalls that of classic dress watches of the past
cons: Gold face may be hard to read in darker environments

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this same watch for over 30 years. The last one I lost at the SFO International airport and it was never found so I bought the same exact watch but this time it was solar. I will wear this watch on my travels all over the world. This Seiko is light, beautiful, and looks exactly like a gold bracelet on my wrist. The only difference with this one and my last one is that this has a slightly more complicated closure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is exactly what I've been looking for. I had one year ago that accidentally got washed and I haven't seen one I liked and could afford until this one. It fits like a bracelet which is what I want. Also, the clasp is easy to use and a significant upgrade from years ago. They are uncomfortable if they fit snug. I can't comment on the water resistance as I take it off to do dishes etc... It took me so long to find this one that I want to take the very best of care
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the same watch, not solar powered, that I lost. Decided to go with solar battery model because of a better clasp and not having to relace battery. Very slim and elegant. Love this style. Price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Quality, elegance and class.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful watch!! Measures 8 inches, including the 1 inch watch, with clasp fastened; 10 inches when clasp is open. The band itself is flexible and does not pinch as many of the cheaper ones do. Hour markings are beautifully displayed, large enough to be easily read. Solar powered, charged per instructions, and it has performed perfectly. A unique combination of elegance for those special occasions yet casual enough for everyday wear. The quality of this watch puts it in a class by itself when compared to others in the same to moderately higher price range.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra, Lakeland Fl.

customer_reviews.title: Watch was very elegant-looking and I loved that is was light powered
customer_reviews.text: Watch was very elegant-looking and I loved that is was light powered. Unfortunately I had to return it because the face was gold, it made it too difficult for the to see the gold hands. The issue was definitely because of my eyes and not the watch itself. If the face were white or black it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MarieC

customer_reviews.title: Regal, expensive looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. People assume it’s 14K gold because that’s all I basically wear. The shine is incredible and it looks VERY expensive. My jeweler has the exact same one for sale. When he saw mine, he asked why I didn’t purchase it from him. When I told him how much I paid for it, he had to admit he could not beat the Amazon price!
customer_reviews.author: LadyFitz

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit large (I can have it adjusted) I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact the watch is a bit large (I can have it adjusted) I love this watch. I have had it only a few weeks so I don't know how long it will be able to be charged and then recharged. But the price is reasonable and the watch is truly very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: net shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, almost dainty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, almost dainty, watch. Super like that the battery is solar charged, of all things. Haven't had problem one with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Txcdi

customer_reviews.title: Seiko watch
customer_reviews.text: band is way to big will have to have links removed (hopefully they will do it) everyone notices it and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Vanderzanden

customer_reviews.title: This is a great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this watch every day for over two years. It works great and is quite pretty. I have gotten many compliments on the design, and people are surprised that a solar watch can be so feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and keeps great time.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it works & looks . I was able to have links removed so it would fit my small wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beatiful but it is not working. I am very sad for that. I dont recommended
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my wife and she is very pleased with it, work great so far.
customer_reviews.author: rick haas

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design with proven reliability and accuracy. Can't go wrong with this tasteful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Christie B. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my mother for a birthday gift. It is gorgeous and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my wife. She thinks it's the perfect replacement for the old that is broken.
customer_reviews.author: GAT

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I had an earlier model with a horrible clasp. Finally l ok st it. But I loved the watch. The new one has a much improved clasp. Good price, good service.
customer_reviews.author: defearing

customer_reviews.title: very pretty watch
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty watch, bought for dressier occasions. It is small and the face is gold which makes it a bit difficult to read, especially in low light. The closure part of the band feels a little too delicate, hoping it will not break. Overall like the watch a lot, Seiko does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Ponec, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch. Keeps excellent time. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is even more beautiful than the picture I LOV LOVE LOVE this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Better make sure it fits quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add an extra link to the watch band. I called Seiko to order one and was told that ONE little tiny link will cost $23.00 plus tax and shipping! This is 1/5 of the TOTAL cost of the entire watch. That is totally ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Frances T.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and feminine, light gold color not yellow almost orange, I love it
customer_reviews.author: D5e

customer_reviews.title: Bracelet too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I liked the watch but the band was a deal breaker. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is prettier in person! Just the right size with a touch of vintage and subtle elegance. I remember my mom having a Seiko watch and i always admired it. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: This was a beautiful piece. Great quality and very pleasing to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful piece. Great quality and very pleasing to the eyes. I was also pleased with the price. Definitely had the wow effect I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Solar Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch was very good. But it did not have the date. The time it took to arrive was too long.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal on a stylish ladies watch that is solar powered.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her watch. She really liked the dainty band and is happy with the stylish look and feel. A huge plus is the solar power and the 3 year warranty. Changing the links was easy after watching a YouTube video using simple household tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: This watch is fantastic and I saved over $100 from what it cost at a local department store
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and so far so good on keeping time
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch! Looked exactly as depicted in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Looked exactly as depicted in the photo. Very elegant and loved the band. The watch arrived perfectly and carefully packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Melelina

customer_reviews.title: The perfect watch
customer_reviews.text: I live this watch. So beautiful, and I've received so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J.

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Received the watch promptly. So glad I read the good reviews first and decided on this watch. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ML Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. It is so stylish and classic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter. Just what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: She loved it at first sight, fits and looks like a bracelet because it is handsomely crafted that way.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Maggard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: chandra upreti

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great service
customer_reviews.text: The watch came in brand new in box. Great deal and great service!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: is very nice and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This watch came well packaged, is very nice and exactly what I was looking for, need and expected from Seiko. At this point I am very, very happy with this watch. It looks good whether I'm in dressy or casual attire.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkrose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good value- was much easier to find the watch my wife wanted on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: prompter666

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I ruined my last watch like this years ago. When I saw this solar watch, I had to have it. It is beautiful and exceeds my every wish.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Nored

product_meta.title: Seiko Women's SUP276 Analog Display Analog Quartz Gold Watch
product_meta.description:
From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



Seiko Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light energy, using solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with 12 month power reserve once fully charged. This elegant ladies' timepiece is designed with a gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet and champagne dial. 30 meters water resistant.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :5.1 x 5 x 3.7 inches; 7.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :SUP276
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :January 29, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Seiko Watch Corporation
 * ASIN :B00RZCZ26S
 * 
 * Domestic Shipping:Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
 * International Shipping:This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #121,312 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #55088 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #394 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars126 ratings
